00075 #if LITTLE_ENDIAN_MCU
00076   #define Dfu_format_mcu_to_dfu_data(width, data) (TPASTE2(Swap, width)(data))
00077   #define Dfu_format_dfu_to_mcu_data(width, data) (TPASTE2(Swap, width)(data))
00078   #define dfu_format_mcu_to_dfu_data(width, data) (TPASTE2(swap, width)(data))
00079   #define dfu_format_dfu_to_mcu_data(width, data) (TPASTE2(swap, width)(data))
00080 #else // BIG_ENDIAN_MCU
00081   #define Dfu_format_mcu_to_dfu_data(width, data) ((TPASTE2(U, width))(data))
00082   #define Dfu_format_dfu_to_mcu_data(width, data) ((TPASTE2(U, width))(data))
00083   #define dfu_format_mcu_to_dfu_data(width, data) ((TPASTE2(U, width))(data))
00084   #define dfu_format_dfu_to_mcu_data(width, data) ((TPASTE2(U, width))(data))

00089 // Command groups
00090 #define CMD_GRP_DNLOAD                    0x01
00091 #define CMD_GRP_UPLOAD                    0x03
00092 #define CMD_GRP_EXEC                      0x04
00093 #define CMD_GRP_SELECT                    0x06
00094 
00095 // CMD_GRP_DNLOAD commands
00096 #define CMD_PROGRAM_START                 0x00
00097 
00098 // CMD_GRP_UPLOAD commands
00099 #define CMD_READ_MEMORY                   0x00
00100 #define CMD_BLANK_CHECK                   0x01
00101 
00102 // CMD_GRP_EXEC commands
00103 #define CMD_ERASE                         0x00
00104 #define CMD_START_APPLI                   0x03
00105 
00106 // CMD_GRP_SELECT commands
00107 #define CMD_SELECT_MEMORY                 0x03
00108 
00109 // CMD_ERASE arguments
00110 #define CMD_ERASE_ARG_CHIP                0xFF
00111 
00112 // CMD_START_APPLI arguments
00113 #define CMD_START_APPLI_ARG_RESET         0x00
00114 #define CMD_START_APPLI_ARG_NO_RESET      0x01
00115 
00116 // CMD_SELECT_MEMORY arguments
00117 #define CMD_SELECT_MEMORY_ARG_UNIT        0x00
00118 #define CMD_SELECT_MEMORY_ARG_PAGE        0x01
00119 
00120 // Memory units (CMD_SELECT_MEMORY_ARG_UNIT arguments)
00121 #define MEM_FLASH                         0x00
00122 #define MEM_EEPROM                        0x01
00123 #define MEM_SECURITY                      0x02
00124 #define MEM_CONFIGURATION                 0x03
00125 #define MEM_BOOTLOADER                    0x04
00126 #define MEM_SIGNATURE                     0x05
00127 #define MEM_USER                          0x06
00128 
00129 // Number of memory units
00130 #define MEM_COUNT                         (MEM_USER + 1)
00131 
00132 // Product information addresses
00133 #define PRODUCT_MANUFACTURER_ID_ADDRESS   0x00
00134 #define PRODUCT_FAMILY_ID_ADDRESS         0x01
00135 #define PRODUCT_ID_ADDRESS                0x02
00136 #define PRODUCT_REVISION_ADDRESS          0x03
00137 
00138 // Number of product information items
00139 #define PRODUCT_INF_ITEM_COUNT            (PRODUCT_REVISION_ADDRESS + 1)
00140 
00141 // ISP information addresses
00142 #define ISP_VERSION_ADDRESS               0x00
00143 #define ISP_ID0_ADDRESS                   0x01
00144 #define ISP_ID1_ADDRESS                   0x02
00145 
00146 // Number of ISP information items
00147 #define ISP_INF_ITEM_COUNT                (ISP_ID1_ADDRESS + 1)
00148

00152 static void mem_flash_read(void *dst, U32 src, size_t nbytes);
00153 static void mem_flash_write(U32 dst, const void *src, size_t nbytes);
00154 static void mem_security_read(void *dst, U32 src, size_t nbytes);
00155 static void mem_security_write(U32 dst, const void *src, size_t nbytes);
00156 static void mem_configuration_read(void *dst, U32 src, size_t nbytes);
00157 static void mem_configuration_write(U32 dst, const void *src, size_t nbytes);
00158 static void mem_bootloader_read(void *dst, U32 src, size_t nbytes);
00159 static void mem_signature_read(void *dst, U32 src, size_t nbytes);
00160 static void mem_user_read(void *dst, U32 src, size_t nbytes);
00161 static void mem_user_write(U32 dst, const void *src, size_t nbytes);

00166 typedef union
00167 {
00168   U32 long_address;
00169   struct
00170   {
00171     unsigned int page         : 16;
00172     unsigned int page_offset  : 16;
00173   };
00174 } address_t;
00175 
00176 
00177 static U8 PRODUCT_INF[PRODUCT_INF_ITEM_COUNT] =
00178 {
00179   PRODUCT_MANUFACTURER_ID,
00180   PRODUCT_FAMILY_ID
00181 };
00182 
00183 static const U8 ISP_INF[ISP_INF_ITEM_COUNT] =
00184 {
00185   ISP_VERSION,
00186   ISP_ID0,
00187   ISP_ID1
00188 };
00189 
00190 static address_t MEMORY_END_ADDRESS[MEM_COUNT] =
00191 {
00192   // MEM_FLASH
00193   {AVR32_FLASH_SIZE - 1},
00194 
00195   // MEM_EEPROM
00196   {0},
00197 
00198   // MEM_SECURITY
00199   {0},
00200 
00201   // MEM_CONFIGURATION
00202   {31},
00203 
00204   // MEM_BOOTLOADER
00205   {sizeof(ISP_INF) - 1},
00206 
00207   // MEM_SIGNATURE
00208   {sizeof(PRODUCT_INF) - 1},
00209 
00210   // MEM_USER
00211   {AVR32_FLASHC_USER_PAGE_SIZE - 1}
00212 };
00213 
00214 static const struct
00215 {
00216   void (*read)(void *dst, U32 src, size_t nbytes);
00217   void (*write)(U32 dst, const void *src, size_t nbytes);
00218 } MEMORY_ACCESS[MEM_COUNT] =
00219 {
00220   // MEM_FLASH
00221   {
00222     mem_flash_read,
00223     mem_flash_write
00224   },
00225 
00226   // MEM_EEPROM
00227   {
00228     NULL,
00229     NULL
00230   },
00231 
00232   // MEM_SECURITY
00233   {
00234     mem_security_read,
00235     mem_security_write
00236   },
00237 
00238   // MEM_CONFIGURATION
00239   {
00240     mem_configuration_read,
00241     mem_configuration_write
00242   },
00243 
00244   // MEM_BOOTLOADER
00245   {
00246     mem_bootloader_read,
00247     NULL
00248   },
00249 
00250   // MEM_SIGNATURE
00251   {
00252     mem_signature_read,
00253     NULL
00254   },
00255 
00256   // MEM_USER
00257   {
00258     mem_user_read,
00259     mem_user_write
00260   }
00261 };
00262 
00263 static const U8 MEMORY_ERASE_VALUE[MEM_COUNT] =
00264 {
00265   // MEM_FLASH
00266   0xFF,
00267 
00268   // MEM_EEPROM
00269   0xFF,
00270 
00271   // MEM_SECURITY
00272   0x00,
00273 
00274   // MEM_CONFIGURATION
00275   0x01,
00276 
00277   // MEM_BOOTLOADER
00278   0x00,
00279 
00280   // MEM_SIGNATURE
00281   0x00,
00282 
00283   // MEM_USER
00284   0xFF
00285 };
00286 
00287 static Bool security_active = TRUE;
00288 static S32 length;
00289 static U8 cmd_group = CMD_GRP_EXEC;
00290 static U8 cmd = CMD_START_APPLI;
00291 static U8 memory = MEM_FLASH;
00292 static address_t start_address;
00293 static address_t end_address;
00294 static U32 data_bytes;
00295 static U8 dfu_frame[DFU_FRAME_LENGTH];
00296 static U8 dfu_status = STATUS_OK;
00297 
00298 U8 usb_dfu_status = STATUS_OK;
00299 U8 usb_dfu_state = STATE_dfuIDLE;
00300 
00301 
00302 static Bool is_isp_forced(void)
00303 {
00304   return flashc_read_gp_fuse_bit(ISP_GPFB_FORCE_OFFSET);
00305 }
00306 
00307 
00308 static void force_isp(Bool force)
00309 {
00310   flashc_set_gp_fuse_bit(ISP_GPFB_FORCE_OFFSET, force);
00311 }
00312 
00313 
00314 static Bool get_and_check_mem_range(void)
00315 {
00316   start_address.page_offset = Usb_read_endpoint_data(EP_CONTROL, 16);
00317   start_address.page_offset = dfu_format_dfu_to_mcu_data(16, start_address.page_offset);
00318   end_address.page_offset = Usb_read_endpoint_data(EP_CONTROL, 16);
00319   end_address.page_offset = dfu_format_dfu_to_mcu_data(16, end_address.page_offset);
00320 
00321   if (end_address.long_address < start_address.long_address ||
00322       end_address.long_address > MEMORY_END_ADDRESS[memory].long_address)
00323   {
00324     dfu_status = STATUS_errADDRESS;
00325     return FALSE;
00326   }
00327 
00328   data_bytes = end_address.long_address - start_address.long_address + 1;
00329   return TRUE;
00330 }
00331 
00332 
00333 static void mem_flash_read(void *dst, U32 src, size_t nbytes)
00334 {
00335   memcpy(dst, AVR32_FLASH + src, nbytes);
00336 }
00337 
00338 
00339 static void mem_flash_write(U32 dst, const void *src, size_t nbytes)
00340 {
00341   flashc_memcpy(AVR32_FLASH + dst, src, nbytes, FALSE);
00342 }
00343 
00344 
00345 static void mem_security_read(void *dst, U32 src, size_t nbytes)
00346 {
00347   if (nbytes)
00348     *(U8 *)dst = flashc_is_security_bit_active();
00349 }
00350 
00351 
00352 static void mem_security_write(U32 dst, const void *src, size_t nbytes)
00353 {
00354   if (nbytes && *(U8 *)src)
00355   {
00356     security_active = TRUE;
00357     flashc_activate_security_bit();
00358   }
00359 }
00360 
00361 
00362 static void mem_configuration_read(void *dst, U32 src, size_t nbytes)
00363 {
00364   U8 *dest = dst;
00365   while (nbytes--)
00366     *dest++ = flashc_read_gp_fuse_bit(src++);
00367 }
00368 
00369 
00370 static void mem_configuration_write(U32 dst, const void *src, size_t nbytes)
00371 {
00372   const U8 *source = src;
00373   while (nbytes--)
00374     flashc_set_gp_fuse_bit(dst++, *source++);
00375 }
00376 
00377 
00378 static void mem_bootloader_read(void *dst, U32 src, size_t nbytes)
00379 {
00380   memcpy(dst, ISP_INF + src, nbytes);
00381 }
00382 
00383 
00384 static void mem_signature_read(void *dst, U32 src, size_t nbytes)
00385 {
00386   memcpy(dst, PRODUCT_INF + src, nbytes);
00387 }
00388 
00389 
00390 static void mem_user_read(void *dst, U32 src, size_t nbytes)
00391 {
00392   memcpy(dst, (U8 *)AVR32_FLASHC_USER_PAGE + src, nbytes);
00393 }
00394 
00395 
00396 static void mem_user_write(U32 dst, const void *src, size_t nbytes)
00397 {
00398   flashc_memcpy(AVR32_FLASHC_USER_PAGE + dst, src, nbytes, TRUE);
00399 }
00400 
00401 
00402 static void erase_check_mem(void)
00403 {
00404   U8 *frame;
00405   U32 frame_bytes;
00406 
00407   while (data_bytes)
00408   {
00409     frame = dfu_frame;
00410     frame_bytes = min(data_bytes, DFU_FRAME_LENGTH);
00411     data_bytes -= frame_bytes;
00412 
00413     MEMORY_ACCESS[memory].read(frame, start_address.long_address, frame_bytes);
00414 
00415     while (frame_bytes--)
00416     {
00417       if (*frame++ != MEMORY_ERASE_VALUE[memory])
00418       {
00419         dfu_status = STATUS_errCHECK_ERASED;
00420         return;
00421       }
00422       start_address.long_address++;
00423     }
00424   }
00425 }
00426 
00427 
00428 static void read_mem(void)
00429 {
00430   void *frame;
00431   U32 frame_bytes;
00432 
00433   while (data_bytes)
00434   {
00435     frame = dfu_frame;
00436     frame_bytes = min(data_bytes, DFU_FRAME_LENGTH);
00437     data_bytes -= frame_bytes;
00438 
00439     MEMORY_ACCESS[memory].read(frame, start_address.long_address, frame_bytes);
00440     start_address.long_address += frame_bytes;
00441 
00442     while (frame_bytes)
00443     {
00444       while (!Is_usb_control_in_ready());
00445 
00446       Usb_reset_endpoint_fifo_access(EP_CONTROL);
00447       frame_bytes = usb_write_ep_txpacket(EP_CONTROL, frame, frame_bytes, (const void **)&frame);
00448       Usb_ack_control_in_ready_send();
00449     }
00450   }
00451 }
00452 
00453 
00454 static void write_mem(void)
00455 {
00456   void *frame;
00457   U32 frame_bytes, unaligned_frame_bytes;
00458 
00459   data_bytes += Get_align(start_address.long_address, EP_CONTROL_LENGTH);
00460   length -= EP_CONTROL_LENGTH + Align_up(data_bytes, EP_CONTROL_LENGTH);
00461 
00462   while (data_bytes)
00463   {
00464     frame = dfu_frame;
00465     frame_bytes = min(data_bytes, DFU_FRAME_LENGTH);
00466     unaligned_frame_bytes = frame_bytes - Get_align(start_address.long_address, EP_CONTROL_LENGTH);
00467     data_bytes -= frame_bytes;
00468 
00469     while (frame_bytes)
00470     {
00471       while (!Is_usb_control_out_received());
00472 
00473       Usb_reset_endpoint_fifo_access(EP_CONTROL);
00474       frame_bytes = usb_read_ep_rxpacket(EP_CONTROL, frame, frame_bytes, &frame);
00475       Usb_ack_control_out_received_free();
00476     }
00477 
00478     MEMORY_ACCESS[memory].write(start_address.long_address,
00479                                 dfu_frame + Get_align(start_address.long_address, EP_CONTROL_LENGTH),
00480                                 unaligned_frame_bytes);
00481     start_address.long_address += unaligned_frame_bytes;
00482   }
00483 
00484   while (length > 0)
00485   {
00486     while (!Is_usb_control_out_received());
00487     Usb_ack_control_out_received_free();
00488     length -= EP_CONTROL_LENGTH;
00489   }
00490 }
00491 
00492 
00493 void usb_dfu_init(void)
00494 {
00495   PRODUCT_INF[PRODUCT_ID_ADDRESS] =
00496     Rd_bitfield(Get_system_register(AVR32_CONFIG0), AVR32_CONFIG0_PROCESSORID_MASK);
00497   PRODUCT_INF[PRODUCT_REVISION_ADDRESS] =
00498     Rd_bitfield(Get_system_register(AVR32_CONFIG0), AVR32_CONFIG0_PROCESSORREVISION_MASK);
00499 
00500   MEMORY_END_ADDRESS[MEM_FLASH].long_address = flashc_get_flash_size() - 1;
00501 
00502   security_active = flashc_is_security_bit_active();
00503 }
00504 
00505 
00506 static void usb_dfu_stop(void)
00507 {
00508   force_isp(FALSE);
00509 
00510   Usb_ack_control_out_received_free();
00511   Usb_ack_control_in_ready_send();
00512 
00513   while (!Is_usb_setup_received());
00514   Usb_ack_setup_received_free();
00515   Usb_ack_control_in_ready_send();
00516 
00517   while (!Is_usb_control_in_ready());
00518 
00519   Disable_global_interrupt();
00520   Usb_disable();
00521   (void)Is_usb_enabled();
00522   Enable_global_interrupt();
00523   Usb_disable_otg_pad();
00524 }
00525 
00526 
00529 Bool usb_dfu_dnload(void)
00530 {
00531   static U8 tmp_memory;
00532   static U16 tmp_page;
00533 
00534   if (!is_isp_forced()) force_isp(TRUE);
00535 
00536   dfu_status = STATUS_OK;
00537 
00538   Usb_read_endpoint_data(EP_CONTROL, 16); // Dummy read: wValue.
00539   Usb_read_endpoint_data(EP_CONTROL, 16); // Dummy read: wIndex.
00540   length = Usb_read_endpoint_data(EP_CONTROL, 16);
00541   length = usb_format_usb_to_mcu_data(16, length);
00542   Usb_ack_setup_received_free();
00543 
00544   if (length)
00545   {
00546     while (!Is_usb_control_out_received());
00547     Usb_reset_endpoint_fifo_access(EP_CONTROL);
00548 
00549     cmd_group = Usb_read_endpoint_data(EP_CONTROL, 8);
00550     cmd = Usb_read_endpoint_data(EP_CONTROL, 8);
00551     switch (cmd_group)
00552     {
00553     case CMD_GRP_DNLOAD:
00554       if (security_active)
00555       {
00556         goto unsupported_request;
00557       }
00558       if (!get_and_check_mem_range()) break;
00559       if (!MEMORY_ACCESS[memory].write)
00560       {
00561         dfu_status = STATUS_errWRITE;
00562         break;
00563       }
00564       switch (cmd)
00565       {
00566       case CMD_PROGRAM_START:
00567         Usb_ack_control_out_received_free();
00568         write_mem();
00569         break;
00570 
00571       default:
00572         goto unsupported_request;
00573       }
00574       break;
00575 
00576     case CMD_GRP_UPLOAD:
00577       if (security_active)
00578       {
00579         goto unsupported_request;
00580       }
00581       if (!get_and_check_mem_range()) break;
00582       if (!MEMORY_ACCESS[memory].read)
00583       {
00584         dfu_status = STATUS_errVERIFY;
00585         break;
00586       }
00587       switch (cmd)
00588       {
00589       case CMD_READ_MEMORY:
00590         break;
00591 
00592       case CMD_BLANK_CHECK:
00593         erase_check_mem();
00594         break;
00595 
00596       default:
00597         goto unsupported_request;
00598       }
00599       break;
00600 
00601     case CMD_GRP_EXEC:
00602       switch (cmd)
00603       {
00604       case CMD_ERASE:
00605         switch (Usb_read_endpoint_data(EP_CONTROL, 8))
00606         {
00607         case CMD_ERASE_ARG_CHIP:
00608           memory = MEM_FLASH;
00609           end_address.long_address = start_address.long_address = 0;
00610           flashc_lock_all_regions(FALSE);
00611           flashc_erase_all_pages(FALSE);
00612           security_active = FALSE;
00613           break;
00614 
00615         default:
00616           goto unsupported_request;
00617         }
00618         break;
00619 
00620       case CMD_START_APPLI:
00621         switch (Usb_read_endpoint_data(EP_CONTROL, 8))
00622         {
00623         case CMD_START_APPLI_ARG_RESET:
00624           usb_dfu_stop();
00625           Disable_global_interrupt();
00626           AVR32_WDT.ctrl = AVR32_WDT_CTRL_EN_MASK |
00627                            (10 << AVR32_WDT_CTRL_PSEL_OFFSET) |
00628                            (AVR32_WDT_KEY_VALUE << AVR32_WDT_CTRL_KEY_OFFSET);
00629           AVR32_WDT.ctrl = AVR32_WDT_CTRL_EN_MASK |
00630                            (10 << AVR32_WDT_CTRL_PSEL_OFFSET) |
00631                            ((~AVR32_WDT_KEY_VALUE << AVR32_WDT_CTRL_KEY_OFFSET) & AVR32_WDT_CTRL_KEY_MASK);
00632           while (1);
00633           break;
00634 
00635         case CMD_START_APPLI_ARG_NO_RESET:
00636           usb_dfu_stop();
00637           sys_clk_gen_stop();
00638           wait_10_ms();
00639           boot_program();
00640           break;
00641 
00642         default:
00643           goto unsupported_request;
00644         }
00645         break;
00646 
00647       default:
00648         goto unsupported_request;
00649       }
00650       break;
00651 
00652     case CMD_GRP_SELECT:
00653       if (security_active)
00654       {
00655         goto unsupported_request;
00656       }
00657       switch (cmd)
00658       {
00659       case CMD_SELECT_MEMORY:
00660         switch (Usb_read_endpoint_data(EP_CONTROL, 8))
00661         {
00662         case CMD_SELECT_MEMORY_ARG_UNIT:
00663           switch (tmp_memory = Usb_read_endpoint_data(EP_CONTROL, 8))
00664           {
00665           case MEM_FLASH:
00666           case MEM_EEPROM:
00667           case MEM_SECURITY:
00668           case MEM_CONFIGURATION:
00669           case MEM_BOOTLOADER:
00670           case MEM_SIGNATURE:
00671           case MEM_USER:
00672             memory = tmp_memory;
00673             end_address.long_address = start_address.long_address = 0;
00674             break;
00675 
00676           default:
00677             dfu_status = STATUS_errADDRESS;
00678           }
00679           break;
00680 
00681         case CMD_SELECT_MEMORY_ARG_PAGE:
00682           MSB(tmp_page) = Usb_read_endpoint_data(EP_CONTROL, 8);
00683           LSB(tmp_page) = Usb_read_endpoint_data(EP_CONTROL, 8);
00684           if (tmp_page <= MEMORY_END_ADDRESS[memory].page)
00685           {
00686             end_address.page = start_address.page = tmp_page;
00687           }
00688           else dfu_status = STATUS_errADDRESS;
00689           break;
00690 
00691         default:
00692           goto unsupported_request;
00693         }
00694         break;
00695 
00696       default:
00697         goto unsupported_request;
00698       }
00699       break;
00700 
00701     default:
00702 unsupported_request:
00703       dfu_status = STATUS_errSTALLEDPKT;
00704     }
00705 
00706     Usb_ack_control_out_received_free();
00707   }
00708 
00709   usb_dfu_status = dfu_status;
00710   if (usb_dfu_status != STATUS_OK &&
00711       usb_dfu_status != STATUS_errCHECK_ERASED) return FALSE;
00712 
00713   Usb_ack_control_in_ready_send();
00714   while (!Is_usb_control_in_ready());
00715   return TRUE;
00716 }
00717 
00718 
00721 Bool usb_dfu_upload(void)
00722 {
00723   Usb_ack_setup_received_free();
00724   Usb_reset_endpoint_fifo_access(EP_CONTROL);
00725 
00726   if (cmd_group == CMD_GRP_UPLOAD &&
00727       (dfu_status == STATUS_OK ||
00728        dfu_status == STATUS_errCHECK_ERASED))
00729   {
00730     switch (cmd)
00731     {
00732     case CMD_READ_MEMORY:
00733       read_mem();
00734       break;
00735 
00736     case CMD_BLANK_CHECK:
00737       Usb_write_endpoint_data(EP_CONTROL, 16, dfu_format_mcu_to_dfu_data(16, start_address.page_offset));
00738       break;
00739 
00740     default:
00741       goto unsupported_request;
00742     }
00743   }
00744   else
00745   {
00746 unsupported_request:
00747     dfu_status = STATUS_errSTALLEDPKT;
00748   }
00749 
00750   usb_dfu_status = dfu_status;
00751   if (usb_dfu_status != STATUS_OK &&
00752       usb_dfu_status != STATUS_errCHECK_ERASED) return FALSE;
00753 
00754   if (Usb_byte_count(EP_CONTROL)) Usb_ack_control_in_ready_send();
00755   while (!Is_usb_control_out_received());
00756   Usb_ack_control_out_received_free();
00757   return TRUE;
00758 }
00759 
00760 
00761 #endif  // USB_DEVICE_FEATURE == ENABLED
